data.lyric:
[ti:You (Explicit)]
[ar:Regard/Troye Sivan/Tate McRae]
[al:You (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You (Explicit) - Regard/Troye Sivan/Tate McRae
[00:00.79]Lyrics by：Regard/Troye Sivan/Koda/Tate McRae/Siba/Tom Mann/Isaac Sakima
[00:02.26]Composed by：Regard/Troye Sivan/Koda/Tate McRae/Siba/Tom Mann/Isaac Sakima
[00:03.74]All I see is you
[00:05.59]There's u
[00:06.74]There's u
[00:07.56]Troye Sivan：
[00:09.47]How could you ever leave me without a chance to try
[00:15.96]How can I be sorry if I don't know the crime
[00:20.62]I should be mad cos you never told me why
[00:24.26]Still I can't seem to say goodbye
[00:29.47]When I try to fall back I fall back to you
[00:33.84]When I talk to my friends I talk about you
[00:38.42]When the Hennessy's strong all I see is you
[00:47.42]No I haven't moved on but trust me I tried
[00:51.89]If I give you a call don't hang up the line
[00:56.41]When the Hennessy's strong all I see is you
[01:11.17]Tate McRae：
[01:13.20]I'm good at overthinking
[01:15.17]But I haven't even got this far
[01:17.39]All I know is that my mind is
[01:19.64]In the backseat of your corvette car
[01:22.13]You got me at my baddest
[01:24.19]And you got me round your fingertip
[01:26.47]Should be fed up with your bulls**t
[01:28.33]But everything about you
[01:29.29]No I can't resist
[01:30.92]How could you ever leave me without a chance to try
[01:37.49]How can I be sorry if I don't know the crime
[01:42.15]I should be mad that you never told me why
[01:46.36]Still I can't seem to say goodbye
[01:49.08]Both：
[01:50.97]When I try to fall back I fall back to you
[01:55.36]When I talk to my friends I talk about you
[01:59.88]When the Jealousy's strong all I see is you
[02:03.13]There's u
[02:04.15]There's u
[02:09.18]No I haven't moved on but trust me I tried
[02:13.41]If I give you a call don't hang up the line
[02:17.95]When the Jealousy's strong all I see is you
[02:21.22]There's u
[02:22.26]There's u
[02:31.60]There's u
[02:39.40]There's u
[02:40.36]There's u
[02:43.13]I see your face in every stranger everywhere I go
[02:47.65]I hear your voice in conversations every word you spoke
[02:52.19]Nearly blocked you on my phone about a thousand times
[02:58.99]Yeah I know I should say goodbye
[03:08.03]Yeah I know I should say goodbye
[03:12.36]When I try to fall back I fall back to you
[03:16.84]When I talk to my friends I talk about you
[03:21.36]When the Hennessy strong all I see is you
[03:24.66]There's u
[03:25.64]There's u
[03:30.72]No I haven't moved on but trust me I tried
[03:35.01]If I give you a call don't hang up the line
[03:39.51]When the Hennessy strong all I see is you
[03:42.60]There's u
[03:43.74]There's u
data.trans:
[ti:You (Explicit)]
[ar:Regard/Troye Sivan/Tate McRae]
[al:You (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.79]//
[00:02.26]//
[00:03.74]我所看到的都是你
[00:05.59]你无处不在
[00:06.74]你无处不在
[00:07.56]//
[00:09.47]你怎么能离我而去 连一个尝试的机会都不愿给我
[00:15.96]如果我不知道我错在何处 我怎么会感到抱歉
[00:20.62]你从未告诉我缘由 我应该感到生气
[00:24.26]我似乎依然无法与你告别
[00:29.47]当我试着抽身时 我对你难以割舍
[00:33.84]当我与朋友聊天时 我提起了你
[00:38.42]当轩尼诗酒让我酩酊大醉时 我所看到的都是你
[00:47.42]我难以释怀 但是请你相信我 我试过了
[00:51.89]如果我打电话给你 请不要挂断电话
[00:56.41]当轩尼诗酒让我酩酊大醉时 我所看到的都是你
[01:11.17]//
[01:13.20]我总是爱胡思乱想
[01:15.17]但是我还没有走到这一步
[01:17.39]我只知道我的心
[01:19.64]留在你克尔维特车子的后座上
[01:22.13]你让我展露出我最坏的一面
[01:24.19]你用指尖环绕着我
[01:26.47]应该对你的胡言乱语感到厌烦
[01:28.33]但是与你有关的一切
[01:29.29]我难以抗拒
[01:30.92]你怎么能离我而去 连一个尝试的机会都不愿给我
[01:37.49]如果我不知道我错在何处 我怎么会感到抱歉
[01:42.15]你从未告诉我缘由 我应该感到生气
[01:46.36]我似乎依然无法与你告别
[01:49.08]//
[01:50.97]当我试着抽身时 我对你难以割舍
[01:55.36]当我与朋友聊天时 我提起了你
[01:59.88]当我感到无比嫉妒时 我所看到的都是你
[02:03.13]你无处不在
[02:04.15]你无处不在
[02:09.18]我难以释怀 但是请你相信我 我试过了
[02:13.41]如果我打电话给你 请不要挂断电话
[02:17.95]当我感到无比嫉妒时 我所看到的都是你
[02:21.22]你无处不在
[02:22.26]你无处不在
[02:31.60]你无处不在
[02:39.40]你无处不在
[02:40.36]你无处不在
[02:43.13]无论我走到哪里 我在每个陌生人的身上看到你的脸庞
[02:47.65]聆听着你在交谈中吐露每一个字的声音
[02:52.19]差不多把你在我的手机里屏蔽了上千次
[02:58.99]我知道我应该与你告别
[03:08.03]我知道我应该与你告别
[03:12.36]当我试着抽身时 我对你难以割舍
[03:16.84]当我与朋友聊天时 我提起了你
[03:21.36]当轩尼诗酒让我酩酊大醉时 我所看到的都是你
[03:24.66]你无处不在
[03:25.64]你无处不在
[03:30.72]我难以释怀 但是请你相信我 我试过了
[03:35.01]如果我打电话给你 请不要挂断电话
[03:39.51]当轩尼诗酒让我酩酊大醉时 我所看到的都是你
[03:42.60]你无处不在
[03:43.74]你无处不在
